articles.author: DAVID RISING
articles.title: Question on ASEAN stumped Hegseth at Senate hearing. What is it and why is it important? - The Associated Press
articles.description: In a heated Senate confirmation hearing for Pete Hegseth, Sen. Tammy Duckworth grilled the proposed defense secretary over the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, asking him if he could name one member and how many countries were in the bloc. Hegseth was …
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) Sen. Tammy Duckworth, grilling President-elect Donald Trumps choice for defense secretary over whether he had the breadth and depth of knowledge needed to lead international negotiations… [+4324 chars]
